frozen.name: python3.7-ydiff
frozen.shortDescription: View colored, incremental diff in workspace or from stdin with side by side and auto pager support (Was "cdiff")
frozen.longDescription:
Term based tool to view colored, incremental diff in a version
controlled workspace (supports Git, Mercurial, Perforce and Svn
so far) or from stdin, with side by side (similar to diff -y)
and auto pager support.
